name: places/ChIJAQBwRapZwokRmyuwe4Yr3aU
formattedAddress: 57 W 38th St, New York, NY 10018, USA
adrFormatAddress: 57 W 38th St, New York, NY 10018, USA

originalText.text:
This is by far the worst “management” groups in NYC. DO NOT live in one of their buildings. Manuel, my building’s “manager” is the biggest joke. Doesn’t reply to messages, and IF he does, he’ll respond to the easiest problem and ignore the rest.
My building in particular has had issues with homeless encampments with violent threats And harassment against those of us who live in the building. I live on the top floor and we have had trespassers come to our door at all hours of the night- they have stolen things from the front door and woken my roommate up in a drunken rage. A gate has been promised since I moved in 2022 and now being 2024 there is no sign of a gate for the foreseeable future.
The external part of the building is FILTHY and they do a pisspoor job of keeping the inside of the building clean.
We have also had a leak that is most certainly producing mold, and Manuel Vallario has not responded to a single claim.
Rent is cheap under solar for a reason. DO NOT bother living here & trust the negative reviews.

*I do not want to add photos at this time due to my still living at this apartment*

originalText.text: Literally pick any company except this one. I lived in one of their buildings, and it was the worst experience of my life. They broke my radiator (and never came back to fix it), and I had a ton of pests (mice and roaches) which was never resolved either. I had an inspector come and they filed THREE Class C violations, and one Class B violation. Even after that, these issues were never resolved, so I said screw it and moved out. All the while was told by the management (Mekkehan and Yinet) to basically shut up and get over it. The super manager (Manny) was also incredibly unresponsive with my requests to fix these issues. This all went on for 6+ months. And once I moved out, I ran into my neighbor who said they were having the same issues as well. Solar is a sorry excuse for a company, and your rent money should never go in their pockets.

originalText.text: ABSOLUTELY THE WORST I'VE EVER DEALT WITH! Dealt with broker and explained my situation. They assured me I woud be ok to apply for the apartment. I did so. I paid my application fee, got al the documentation together. Tried contcting my broker, and he won't answer my calls! I tried texting him. Won't respond to texts unless I harass him, and that will still take a few days to get a response! Unprofessional, uncaring, and unwilling to communicate. If there was a -5 star rating, I'd pick that! Unimpressd and wish to do no business with these people again! Do so at your own risk!!

originalText.text: Dundar is a true professional. Incredibly receptive to questions and very efficient. Goes above and beyond to meet all your expectations. He is the greatest thing to happen to this company! In fact, any company would be lucky to have him.

text.text: Dundar is a true professional. Incredibly receptive to questions and very efficient. Goes above and beyond to meet all your expectations. He is the greatest thing to happen to this company! In fact, any company would be lucky to have him.

originalText.text: Absolute trash of a company. My ceiling is falling out of the wall, the wallpaper is peeling off the walls, our sink doesn't have hot water, our shower is never hot, there are holes in all the walls in the stairwell (which looks like it hasn't been cleaned or updated in 10+ years), and I could continue to go on with the issues. On top of all of this, we have never even spoken to our landlord, because he won't call us back, and the realty company won't call us back. I even left a message on the "president" of the company's phone. DO NOT live in one of their buildings. You will pay too much money to be treated like you live there for free.
